-- read me --: This file is used to configure the Archived Tweets page. Specify a user ID for the main account below:
-- customize --: Below are some options you can use to customize the appearance of the page.
-- aliases --: Specify known twitter handle aliases for updating older/outdated ones.
-- favorite tweets --: Specify the ID's of any tweets to be set as favorites by default.
-- hidden tweets --: Specify the ID's of any tweets to be hidden from the archive (they will still be in the data, but not rendered).
-- date cutoff --: Specify a date to only show tweets up to that point (set to false for no cutoff date).
